_meanings:
{@--7@}
Withdrawing the organs of sense
and perception from the external
world and its objects.

{@--10@} A mode of
expression in which a word used
elliptically, besides retaining its
own primary sense, conveys
another (in addition to that
which is actually expressed);
{#svasidDaye parAkzepaH… upAdAnaM#} <ls>K. P. 2.</ls>
